task.title: Adding new Headers
task.shortdesc: New headers can be added to the HeaderSet by using one of the provided add..Header() methods.

context.p: To add a header to a MIME entity (such as the message):

step.cmd: Get the HeaderSet from the entity by via its getHeaders() method.
Add the header to the HeaderSet by calling one of the add..Header() methods described in .

result.p: The added header will appear in the message when it is sent.
